metadata.title: ViuiDueTure Quick Release Leather Watch Band - 18mm 20mm 22mm 24mm Replacement Wrist Strap for Men Women
features: ✅ 18mm Watch Band- Compatible with any traditional or smart watch with 18mm lug width. Quick release spring bars are included with and integrated into the band. So it is important that your watch’s lug width matches the band width – 18mm. Measure where band meets the watch casing;
SELECT PROPER WIDTH: This watch strap compatible with any traditional watches or smart watches that uses 18mm, 20mm 22mm, 24mm spring bars; Please make sure the lug width of your watch before order;

OPTIMAL FIT: ViuiDueTure watch bands fit most wrists. Designed to fit wrists 5.75" to 8", which covers most of the population, but watch geometry also impacts fit. If you are not sure if the strap length is appropriate, contact us and we will give you a suggestion;

EASY INSTALLATION: FREE SPRING BARS AND TOOL - Every watch strap comes with 2 replacement spring bars and the spring bar removal tool. No need to buy a separate spring bar to your brand new watch strap;

SERVICE : Any product issues we guarantee 100% refund or replacement, providing you a wonderful shopping experience. More questions please feel free to contact us and we will reply to you within 12 hours;
description: We promise to give you the best "Intimate, Efficient, Quick" service.
ViuiDueTure ensure that your purchasing is 100% risk-free.Please CONTACT ViuiDueTure at the first time if got defective ViuiDueTure watch bands;
